mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.aric_id , t1.aric_num , t1.aric_model , t2.model_num as modelName , t1.custumer_id , t3.company_name as custumerName , t1.flight_hour , t1.flight_hour_dev , t1.takeoff_land , t1.takeoff_land_dev , t1.date_type , t1.flt_days , t1.engine_work_time , t1.apu_work_time , t1.start_time , t1.end_time , t1.aircratf_status , t1.grounded_reason , t1.cut_off_time , t1.update_date , t1.update_by , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from csmp_om_aircraftdynamics t1 left join csmp_bd_aricarftmodel t2 on t1.aric_model =t2.id left join csmp_bd_companyinfo t3 on t1.custumer_id =t3.id
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean.id}||'%'
and t1.ARIC_ID like '%'||#{bean.aricId}||'%'
and t1.ARIC_NUM like '%'||#{bean.aricNum}||'%'
and t1.ARIC_MODEL like '%'||#{bean.aricModel}||'%'
and t1.CUSTUMER_ID like '%'||#{bean.custumerId}||'%'
and t1.FLIGHT_HOUR like '%'||#{bean.flightHour}||'%'
and t1.FLIGHT_HOUR_DEV like '%'||#{bean.flightHourDev}||'%'
and t1.TAKEOFF_LAND like '%'||#{bean.takeoffLand}||'%'
and t1.TAKEOFF_LAND_DEV like '%'||#{bean.takeoffLandDev}||'%'
and t1.DATE_TYPE like '%'||#{bean.dateType}||'%'
and t1.FLT_DAYS like '%'||#{bean.fltDays}||'%'
and t1.ENGINE_WORK_TIME like '%'||#{bean.engineWorkTime}||'%'
and t1.APU_WORK_TIME like '%'||#{bean.apuWorkTime}||'%'
and t1.START_TIME >= #{bean.startTimeBegin}
and t1.START_TIME <= #{bean.startTimeEnd}
and t1.END_TIME >= #{bean.endTimeBegin}
and t1.END_TIME <= #{bean.endTimeEnd}
and t1.AIRCRATF_STATUS like '%'||#{bean.aircratfStatus}||'%'
and t1.GROUNDED_REASON like '%'||#{bean.groundedReason}||'%'
and t1.CUT_OFF_TIME >= #{bean.cutOffTimeBegin}
and t1.CUT_OFF_TIME <= #{bean.cutOffTimeEnd}
and t1.UPDATE_DATE >= #{bean.updateDateBegin}
and t1.UPDATE_DATE <= #{bean.updateDateEnd}
and t1.UPDATE_BY like '%'||#{bean.updateBy}||'%'
and t1.REMARK like '%'||#{bean.remark}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean.attribute10}||'%'
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.cut_off_time desc

select t1.id , t1.aric_id , t1.aric_num , t1.aric_model , t1.custumer_id , t1.flight_hour , t1.flight_hour_dev , t1.takeoff_land , t1.takeoff_land_dev , t1.date_type , t1.flt_days , t1.engine_work_time , t1.apu_work_time , t1.start_time , t1.end_time , t1.aircratf_status , t1.grounded_reason , t1.cut_off_time , t1.update_date , t1.update_by , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from csmp_om_aircraftdynamics t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into csmp_om_aircraftdynamics
id,
aric_id,
aric_num,
aric_model,
custumer_id,
flight_hour,
flight_hour_dev,
takeoff_land,
takeoff_land_dev,
date_type,
flt_days,
engine_work_time,
apu_work_time,
start_time,
end_time,
aircratf_status,
grounded_reason,
cut_off_time,
update_date,
update_by,
remark,
created_by,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,
last_update_ip,
version,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,

mapper.update:
update csmp_om_aircraftdynamics t1
t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.aric_id =#{aricId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.aric_num =#{aricNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.aric_model =#{aricModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.custumer_id =#{custumerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.flight_hour =#{flightHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.flight_hour_dev =#{flightHourDev,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.takeoff_land =#{takeoffLand,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.takeoff_land_dev =#{takeoffLandDev,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.date_type =#{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.flt_days =#{fltDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.engine_work_time =#{engineWorkTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.apu_work_time =#{apuWorkTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.start_time =#{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.end_time =#{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.aircratf_status =#{aircratfStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.grounded_reason =#{groundedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.cut_off_time =#{cutOffTime,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.update_date =#{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.update_by =#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.remark =#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.creation_date =#{creationDate},
t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.version =t1.version+1,
t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

update csmp_om_aircraftdynamics t1 set t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.aric_id =#{aricId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.aric_num =#{aricNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.aric_model =#{aricModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.custumer_id =#{custumerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.flight_hour =#{flightHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.flight_hour_dev =#{flightHourDev,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.takeoff_land =#{takeoffLand,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.takeoff_land_dev =#{takeoffLandDev,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.date_type =#{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.flt_days =#{fltDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.engine_work_time =#{engineWorkTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.apu_work_time =#{apuWorkTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.start_time =#{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.end_time =#{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.aircratf_status =#{aircratfStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.grounded_reason =#{groundedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.cut_off_time =#{cutOffTime,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.update_date =#{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.update_by =#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.remark =#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.creation_date =#{creationDate}, t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.version =t1.version+1, t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}
mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.model_id , t3.model_name as modelIdAlias , t1.batch_no , t1.sub_type , t1.desige_by , t1.product_by , t1.contract_no , t1.registrater_no , t1.registrater_date , t1.finished_date , t1.business_period_year , t1.business_period_hour , t1.is_business_period , t1.start_operate_date , t1.operate_status , t1.engine1 , t1.engine2 , t1.number_of_flight , t1.flight_num , t1.takeoff_landing_num , t1.custumer_name , t1.operator , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.company_id , t1.statistical_date , t1.statistical_person , t1.total_flight_days , (select count(1) from CSMP_FM_FAULTREPORT t2 where t1.id = t2.aric_id) as faultNum from CSMP_BD_AIRCRAFTINFO t1 inner join csmp_bd_aricarftmodel t3 on t1.model_id=t3.id
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean1.id}||'%'
and t1.MODEL_ID like '%'||#{bean1.modelId}||'%'
and t1.BATCH_NO =#{bean1.batchNo}
and t1.SUB_TYPE like '%'||#{bean1.subType}||'%'
and t1.DESIGE_BY like '%'||#{bean1.desigeBy}||'%'
and t1.PRODUCT_BY like '%'||#{bean1.productBy}||'%'
and t1.CONTRACT_NO like '%'||#{bean1.contractNo}||'%'
and t1.REGISTRATER_NO like '%'||#{bean1.registraterNo}||'%'
and t1.REGISTRATER_DATE >= #{bean1.registraterDateBegin}
and t1.REGISTRATER_DATE <= #{bean1.registraterDateEnd}
and t1.FINISHED_DATE >= #{bean1.finishedDateBegin}
and t1.FINISHED_DATE <= #{bean1.finishedDateEnd}
and t1.BUSINESS_PERIOD_YEAR like '%'||#{bean1.businessPeriodYear}||'%'
and t1.BUSINESS_PERIOD_HOUR like '%'||#{bean1.businessPeriodHour}||'%'
and t1.IS_BUSINESS_PERIOD like '%'||#{bean1.isBusinessPeriod}||'%'
and t1.START_OPERATE_DATE >= #{bean1.startOperateDate}
and t1.START_OPERATE_DATE >= #{bean1.startOperateDateBegin}
and t1.START_OPERATE_DATE <= #{bean1.startOperateDateEnd}
and t1.OPERATE_STATUS like '%'||#{bean1.operateStatus}||'%'
and t1.ENGINE1 like '%'||#{bean1.engine1}||'%'
and t1.ENGINE2 like '%'||#{bean1.engine2}||'%'
and t1.NUMBER_OF_FLIGHT like '%'||#{bean1.numberOfFlight}||'%'
and t1.FLIGHT_NUM like '%'||#{bean1.flightNum}||'%'
and t1.TAKEOFF_LANDING_NUM like '%'||#{bean1.takeoffLandingNum}||'%'
and t1.CUSTUMER_NAME =#{bean1.custumerName}
and t1.OPERATOR like '%'||#{bean1.operator}||'%'
and t1.REMARK like '%'||#{bean1.remark}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean1.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean1.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean1.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean1.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean1.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean1.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean1.attribute10}||'%'
and t1.COMPANY_ID like '%'||#{bean1.companyId}||'%'
and t1.total_flight_days like '%'||#{bean1.totalFlightDays}||'%'
and t1.statistical_date <=#{bean1.statisticalDate}
and t1.statistical_person like '%'||#{bean1.statisticalPerson}||'%'
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select f.cusid,f.totls,f.normals,c.company_name as comName from (select t.custumer_id as cusid,t.totl as totls,t1.normal as normals from (select custumer_id, count(1) as totl from csmp_om_aircraftdynamics group by custumer_id)t left join (select custumer_id, count(1)as normal from csmp_om_aircraftdynamics where aircratf_status='normal' group by custumer_id) t1 on t.custumer_id=t1.custumer_id) f left join csmp_bd_companyinfo c on f.cusid=c.id

select f.ariid,f.totls,f.normals,a.batch_no as btno from (select t.aric_id as ariid,t.totl as totls,t1.normal as normals from (select aric_id, count(1) as totl from csmp_om_aircraftdynamics group by aric_id)t left join (select aric_id, count(1) as normal from csmp_om_aircraftdynamics where aircratf_status ='normal' group by aric_id) t1 on t.aric_id=t1.aric_id) f left join csmp_bd_aircraftinfo a on f.ariid=a.id

select m.arimol,m.totls,m.normals,l.model_num as mnum,l.model_name as mname from (select t.aric_model as arimol , t.totl as totls , t1.normal as normals from (select aric_model , count(1) as totl from csmp_om_aircraftdynamics group by aric_model) t left join (select aric_model , count(1) as normal from csmp_om_aircraftdynamics where aircratf_status='normal' group by aric_model) t1 on t.aric_model=t1.aric_model) m left join csmp_bd_aricarftmodel l on m.arimol=l.id
